svt_uart_txrx_common Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_uart_txrx_common:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Defines the UART TXRX Common code, implemented as a shell assistant which basically just converts requests into BFM Model requests.

Member Function Documentation

  function bit
 svt_uart_txrx_common::check_xon_xoff_pattern
 (   ) 

This function checks wether the present payload detected on the monitor is equal to XON/XOFF data pattern or not

  task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::collect_response_from_vif
 (  ref svt_uart_transaction response  ) 

This task collects the transaction attributes values from the vif_mon and assign it to the response object (response).

 virtual task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::configure
 (   ) 

This method is of NO relevance for pure simulation environment. This method is needed only for SVT-XTOR environment. This method is to configure XTOR.

 svt_uart_txrx_common::latch_response_from_vif

  function void
 svt_uart_txrx_common::new
 (  svt_uart_vif uart_if , ovm_component comp , svt_uart_configuration cfg = null  ) 

CONSTRUCTOR: Create a new svt_uart_txrx_common instance.

uart_if - Interface that is used to communicate with the UART model.

comp - |xactor Object used for message and other access.

  task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::process_internal_message
 (  ref bit is_valid  ) 

Traps the next message generated by the internal model and routes it through the technology specific messaging subsystem.

is_valid - Indicates whether the message was processed successfully.

 Superseded tasks 
 svt_bfm_shell_assistant :: process_internal_message 

  task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::reconfigure_via_task
 (  ref svt_configuration cfg  ) 

Called when a new configuration is applied to the VIP. This task drives the new configuration to the VIP.

 virtual task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::send_xact
 (  svt_sequence_item xact , string xact_type_name  ) 

  task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::set_verbosity
 (  ref bit is_valid , input int verbosity  ) 

Pushes a new verbosity setting over to the model.

is_valid - Indicates whether the set was successful.

verbosity - Used to update the verbosity in the model. Value corresponds to verbosity in UVM/OVM, severity in VMM.

 Superseded tasks 
 svt_bfm_shell_assistant :: set_verbosity 

 virtual task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::try_receive_frame
 (   ) 

This method is of NO relevance for pure simulation environment. This method is needed only for SVT-XTOR environment. For ZCEI XTORS *txrx.uvm will keep polling this function and checking whether XTOR has received any packet.

 virtual task
 svt_uart_txrx_common::wait_for_reset
 (   )
